extendedInfo.description: Learn the Bible on a daily basis!Great Bible study tool for everyone, young and old.This Bible Trivia Game will allow you to learn the Bible through a fun trivia / quiz style game.  Go through questions from the Old and New Testament.  New Features!!!Now you can unlock different levels which gives you more questions and the ability to have more questions per game!Points Required to reach each level:Level 2 - 10,000Level 3 - 40,000Level 4 - 100,000Level 5 - 250,000Level 6 - 400,000Level 7 - 1,000,000Create a username in order to save your point total in the cloud.  Share your game on Facebook!  See where you rank against all the other users playing the game from around the world. (Must create a username in order to see rank)  Also check out your rank against the rest of the world online at - www.thebibletrivia.comIf you see any questions that you believe have a wrong answer, please feel free to message us and we will look into it. Enjoy and God Bless.

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: I like that this app provides a scripture to verify a question. Wish it was king james though. Good job.
reviews.author: Anthony Liso

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: This app will surely cause you to get in the Word of God
reviews.author: Vanessa Williams

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Very good application for someone who want to know how well he or she knows the bible
reviews.author: Arokoyo Oloruntoba

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: As you expand your knowledge in Christ why not keep it in your fore front
reviews.author: Tricia Williams

reviews.title: Outstanding
reviews.comment: This is a great app, even for ministers. It helps in challenging the mind, stay sharp, and helps keep you in The Word. I recommend it to everyone who loves to have fun reading the Bible. Great for Bible games and after church activities as well.
reviews.author: Michael Smith

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: Teaches me more to about bible .easy-to-use and understand praise to Christ the lord for given me this
reviews.author: francis verma

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: This is a fun way to strengthen Bible knowledge. My only complaint is that the questions don\'t always randomize, so you might literally go through 80 straight that have the same topic (Paul\'s epistles seem to be a favorite with the writer!) Otherwise, this is a must-own for anyone who loves the Bible.
reviews.author: Darien Claxton

reviews.comment: I like it but for some reason it crashes after 10 questions.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Joe
reviews.comment: I love this app. It teaching me more about the Bible.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect tool to make \"free time\" more productive.
reviews.comment: It\'s easy nowadays to get distracted by wastes of time. ... this app isn\'t a waste of time.  Thanks for making this free!  God Bless! ^_^

reviews.comment: Excellent. Improve my knowledge of God\'s Word
